name: Sacrifice For Your Way
description:
Get ready to build your way in this fun 2D plaforming puzzle game: Sacrifice For Your Way!

Can't reach certain plaform, no worries! Use your body as a stepping stone, respawn and try again! 

How to play? Move with arrow keys,. Leave your body and respawn with "R" key. Change body style with "1", "2" and "3" keys. 

This was made thanks to:

Leung Ye Lok (HK) (Leung):  Game Idea, Character Design, Character Animation Design, Mapchip (TileMap) Art, Background Object Art, Camera Control, Character Motion (Jump, Movement), Character Collidor

Kouki Matsuoka (JP) (ライック): Clear Scene, Death Counting System, Goal, Particle Effect

Takayuki Endo (JP) (Takoyaki): Stage Design, Scene Transition, Time managment, Background Oject, Game Testing.

Jani-Patrik Perkkiö (FIN) (Jani-P): Background Design, UI Design, Font, Title Logo

Shizuru Tashiro (JP) (Stream5710): Sound Effect, Background Music, Death System, Checkpoint System

This game is part of CENTRIAxECC game jam 2022!
